text.config.SakuraLib.option.DEBUG.toolt:
This enables the debug mode which will produce more logs
in the console and dump created files to the disk.
text.config.SakuraLib.option.ALWAYS_ADD_: This also adds the example data outside of an development environment.
text.config.SakuraLib.option.ENABLE_WARN:
This enables the warning screen when joining a world in singleplayer.
By default this screen will warn you on version downgrades and mod removals.
text.config.SakuraLib.option.WARN_ON_MAJ:
Warns the player when trying to join a world with an update major version of a mod
than the one used last time to join the world (e.g. 1.0.0 -> 2.0.0).
text.config.SakuraLib.option.WARN_ON_MIN:
Warns the player when trying to join a world with an updated minor or patch version of a mod
than the one used last time to join the world (e.g. 1.0.0 -> 1.1.0 or 1.0.0 -> 1.0.1).
text.config.SakuraLib.option.WARN_ON_FOR:
Warns the player when trying to join a world with an updated format version.
This usually means that the mod has been updated to a new major version.
text.sakuralib.updatetracker.title: Mod Update Information
text.sakuralib.updatetracker.warning_mai: You are about to join a world with different mod versions. This may cause issues.
text.sakuralib.updateTracker.updates_tit: The following mods have been updated since you last played on this world:
text.sakuralib.updateTracker.button.igno: This will ignore the warning and join the world anyway.
text.sakuralib.updateTracker.button.back: This will return you to the main menu.
patchouli_book.sakuralib_dynamic_book.la: This is a dynamically created book. It contains all entries from all mods that use SakuraLib's dynamic book system.
patchouli_book.sakuralib_dynamic_book.mi: This is the main category containing descriptions about core minecraft features.
